extension.name: Social Media Links Slider
extension.author: Bryan Keller
extension.description:
Social Media Links Slider is a module that displays links to all of your social media profile pages so your members and guests can follow and connect with you.

Visit our Forum if you have questions or comments regarding the extension.

Please, vote for the extension on the Joomla! Extensions Directory.
